tool_description: Get the last 10 games of any soccer team in world.
title: Football Soccer Team Score API

api_list.name: Get the Last Games of a Football Team
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the last 10 games of any Football Team in world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-soccer-team-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/team/{teamid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-soccer-team-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
